newsitem.title: INDIA: India M&M Apr-Aug vehicle sales up 23 pct.
newsitem.headline: India M&M Apr-Aug vehicle sales up 23 pct.

text.p: Indian auto firm Mahindra & Mahindra (M&M) said on Friday sales of utility vehicles rose 23 percent to 26,701 units during April 1 to August 22.
M&M Chairman Keshub Mahindra told shareholders at the firm's annual meeting that utility vehicle output was up 15 percent at 26,640 units.
